alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:10AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Labette and Montgomery Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 310 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elk City to near Dearing to near Wann. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Cherryvale, Edna, Dearing, Mound Valley, Elk City, Tyro, Liberty, Bolton, Sycamore, Parsons Tri City Airport, Angola, Dennis, Elk City Lake, Big Hill Lake, Elk City State Park, Independence Airport and Coffeyville Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
